attributes.action: STOP THE DVLA AND THE GOVERNMENTS OVER ZEALOUS CHARGING AND RE-CHARGING OVER AND OVER OF ROAD "MISDEMEANORS"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If someone is caught driving with no insurance, they will have their car taken off them (£150 to get back) go to court (another £200 in fines), if your license is revoked you have to get a PROVISIONAL AGAIN! (£40-£50-not sure) then re-take your test (obviously they gain out of that) and then of course pay for your license again another £50. I know the lesson is dont do it, but they are taking advantage of that lesson that they state so often and making poor people poorer.i would like this petition to cover all aspects that the DVLA charge or impose fines on

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
